channel.title: How to add tags on a forum post
channel.description:
We have added recently the ability to add tags on a forum post
The topic starter or editing the topic you get a chance to search and add tags or create new ones
![tags|690x129](upload://7WJ1zbekQrsVLhHCqgcBrOT3KXd.png)
Tags are available for all users

item.title: How to add tags on a forum post
